content.question: The overall increase of European wealth best explains which of the following demographic developments in the 1700s?

choices.label: The emigration of Europeans to overseas colonies
The increase in the percentage of births outside of marriage
The growth of urban commercial centers
The tendency of people to marry at younger ages

content.answer: The growth of urban commercial centers

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
